ResourceHeader.Description: Kiana (KIAN) station is located in Kiana, Alaska, USA. KIAN is part of the UCLA GBO Network. Magnetic Latitude: 65.0 Magnetic Longitude: 251.50 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 12.0333 Magnetic Declination: 16.79 Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data
